title: Fisher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, cast your hook outside someone's house. You apply "Caught" to all of their visitors.
- During the day, choose to remove Caught from any number of players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evil players will be informed they're Caught.
- You know the name of everyone who is Caught.
- If a Caught player visits a hooked house, you attack them.
- If you kill a good player, remove Caught from all players who currently have it.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, cast your hook outside someone's house, dealing a basic attack to one random visitor other than yourself. 2 uses.

desc:
Post 4815
*Got a biggun' on the line!*
